entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 07:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -24.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -28.1°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
